trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The swan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swan makes two attacks with its beak.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.
